items.text: all my previously mentioned issues with Devvie are gone now that I updated to the 2.0.x version of Spark.

Here is your mission. Go forth and do great things! Mission 1: Become a DevNet SE Evangelist Become a DevNet SE Evangelist (by joining DevNet and identifying yourself as a Cisco SE and evangelizing) Complete the Learning Track for DNA Programmability Hold your own DevNet Express event

Devvie get me my first mission
Hi Devvie - Dave Davenport checking in from GSX
Welcome, Jay G and Chris L! They will help lead the DevNet SE charge!

They will help lead the DevNet SE charge!

items.text: Welcome to the DevNet SE Mission Possible room, Michael K !
items.html: Welcome to the DevNet SE Mission Possible room, <spark-mention data-object-id="e67563f0-f9a0-4d02-98f7-4a73822b77a2" data-object-type="person">Michael K</spark-mention> !

items.text: Here are your missions. Go forth and do great things! Mission 1: Become a DevNet SE Evangelist Become a DevNet SE Evangelist (by joining DevNet and identifying yourself as a Cisco SE and evangelizing) Complete the Learning Track for DNA Programmability Hold your own DevNet Express event Mission 2: Join the DevNet Spark Community Join our DevNet Community and Support Spark Room. Meet developers working with Cisco APIs, and see what questions they are asking To join go here Mission 3: DevNet SE Scavenger Hunt Hack To participate, go to Jive site All the info about how to get started is on the jive site. New challenges daily Join in the Scavenger Hunt Spark room Helpful resources Mission 4: Contribute to Awesome Cisco Spark! Awesome Cisco Spark! is our community project to create a catalog of open resources for Spark developers. Open resources that are free to use, extend and distribute Includes: Client SDKS in various languages Frameworks to quickly build integrations Code samples ranging from handy scripts to end-to-end demo applications Articles & tutorials Complements Spark for Developers & DevNet What is your role? Be a part of Awesome Cisco Spark community in Github Contribute your projects and make them re-usable Enable Cisco customers and partners to live your ideas How do I get involved? Read the contribution guidelines here Package your code tie it up, remove dead parts, and check it runs add a Readme (how to run, and simple examples) add a Licence (MIT, BSD, Apache will favor reuse Submit your contribution fork This add your Resource entry to the Readme.md submit your PR
items.markdown:
Here are your missions. Go forth and do great things!

Mission 1: Become a DevNet SE Evangelist

  • Become a DevNet SE Evangelist (by joining DevNet and identifying yourself as a Cisco SE and evangelizing)
  • Complete the Learning Track for DNA Programmability
  • Hold your own DevNet Express event

Mission 2: Join the DevNet Spark Community

Join our DevNet Community and Support Spark Room.

  • Meet developers working with Cisco APIs, and see what questions they are asking
  • To join go here

Mission 3: DevNet SE Scavenger Hunt Hack

To participate, go to Jive site

  • All the info about how to get started is on the jive site.
  • New challenges daily
  • Join in the Scavenger Hunt Spark room
  • Helpful resources

Mission 4: Contribute to Awesome Cisco Spark!

Awesome Cisco Spark! is our community project to create a catalog of open resources for Spark developers.

Open resources that are free to use, extend and distribute Includes:

  • Client SDKS in various languages
  • Frameworks to quickly build integrations
  • Code samples ranging from handy scripts to end-to-end demo applications
  • Articles & tutorials
  • Complements Spark for Developers & DevNet

What is your role?

  • Be a part of Awesome Cisco Spark community in Github
  • Contribute your projects and make them re-usable
  • Enable Cisco customers and partners to live your ideas

How do I get involved?

  • Read the contribution guidelines here
  • Package your code
    • tie it up, remove dead parts, and check it runs
    • add a Readme (how to run, and simple examples)
    • add a Licence (MIT, BSD, Apache will favor reuse
  • Submit your contribution
    • fork This
    • add your Resource entry to the Readme.md
    • submit your PR

items.text: Welcome Agent! To start Ask Devvie for your missions, for example: @Devvie get me all missions @Devvie get me my 1st mission Be sure to tag Devvie to get his attention! Stuck? ask @Devvie help Go forth and do great things!
items.markdown:
Welcome Agent! To start

  • Ask Devvie for your missions, for example:
    • @Devvie get me all missions
    • @Devvie get me my 1st mission
  • Be sure to tag Devvie to get his attention!
  • Stuck? ask @Devvie help

Go forth and do great things!
items.html:
Welcome Agent! To start

  • Ask Devvie for your missions, for example:
    • @Devvie get me all missions
    • @Devvie get me my 1st mission
  • Be sure to tag Devvie to get his attention!
  • Stuck? ask @Devvie help

Go forth and do great things!

items.text: Good luck getting on the shuttles!
items.html: Good luck getting on the shuttles!

items.text: Hi There! I am Devvie, DevNet's smart bot. I can: help you start you mission possible: @Devvie get my first missions @Devvie show me my mission #3 @Devvie give me all my missions help you find learning labs @Devvie learning labs i want to learn python @Devvie labs i want to know more about apic @Devvie learning labs where can i teach my customers about networking Interact with me, i'm friendly Don't forget to Mention me (@Devvie) to get my attention
items.markdown:
Hi There! I am Devvie, DevNet's smart bot. I can:

  • help you start you mission possible:
    • @Devvie get my first missions
    • @Devvie show me my mission #3
    • @Devvie give me all my missions

  • help you find learning labs

    • @Devvie learning labs i want to learn python
    • @Devvie labs i want to know more about apic
    • @Devvie learning labs where can i teach my customers about networking

  • Interact with me, i'm friendly

  • Don't forget to Mention me (@Devvie) to get my attention
items.html:
Hi There! I am Devvie, DevNet's smart bot. I can:

  • help you start you mission possible:
    • @Devvie get my first missions
    • @Devvie show me my mission #3
    • @Devvie give me all my missions

  • help you find learning labs

    • @Devvie learning labs i want to learn python
    • @Devvie labs i want to know more about apic
    • @Devvie learning labs where can i teach my customers about networking

  • Interact with me, i'm friendly

  • Don't forget to Mention me (@Devvie) to get my attention

items.text: you can also chat with Devvie 1:1 (help function still doesn't work)
James Gill you have to type @devvie and then you have to tag Devvie after you've typed Devvie ;-) make sense?
items.html: <spark-mention data-object-id="9c8cd9d8-1e65-4517-b143-61460841c629" data-object-type="person">James Gill</spark-mention> you have to type @devvie and then you have to tag Devvie after you've typed <spark-mention data-object-id="698463e9-90c7-462d-b3e6-75ee77ae945a" data-object-type="person">Devvie</spark-mention> ;-) make sense?

items.text: Devvie, between you and Spark there's a hypertext formatting problem ‚Ä¶ links don't work. And "help" returns nothing.

items.markdown:
Here are your missions. Go forth and do great things!

Mission 1: Become a DevNet SE Evangelist

  • Become a DevNet SE Evangelist (by joining DevNet and identifying yourself as a Cisco SE and evangelizing)
  • Complete the Learning Track for DNA Programmability
  • Hold your own DevNet Express event

Mission 2: Join the DevNet Spark Community

Join our DevNet Community and Support Spark Room.

  • Meet developers working with Cisco APIs, and see what questions they are asking
  • To join go here

Mission 3: DevNet SE Scavenger Hunt Hack

To participate, go to Jive site

  • All the info about how to get started is on the jive site.
  • New challenges daily
  • Join in the Scavenger Hunt Spark room
  • Helpful resources

Mission 4: Contribute to Awesome Cisco Spark!

Awesome Cisco Spark! is our community project to create a catalog of open resources for Spark developers.

Open resources that are free to use, extend and distribute Includes:

  • Client SDKS in various languages
  • Frameworks to quickly build integrations
  • Code samples ranging from handy scripts to end-to-end demo applications
  • Articles & tutorials
  • Complements Spark for Developers & DevNet

What is your role?

  • Be a part of Awesome Cisco Spark community in Github
  • Contribute your projects and make them re-usable
  • Enable Cisco customers and partners to live your ideas

How do I get involved?

  • Read the contribution guidelines here
  • Package your code
    • tie it up, remove dead parts, and check it runs
    • add a Readme (how to run, and simple examples)
    • add a Licence (MIT, BSD, Apache will favor reuse
  • Submit your contribution
    • fork This
    • add your Resource entry to the Readme.md
    • submit your PR
